title: Neocognitron: A Self-Organizing Neural Network Model for a Mechanism of Visual Pattern Recognition

tldr.text: A neural network model, called a “neocognitron”, is proposed for a mechanism of visual pattern recognition that has characteristics similar to those of visual systems of vertebrates.

references.title: Ferrier lecture - Functional architecture of macaque monkey visual cortex
RECEPTIVE FIELDS AND FUNCTIONAL ARCHITECTURE IN TWO NONSTRIATE VISUAL AREAS (18 AND 19) OF THE CAT.
Functional architecture of macaque monkey visual cortex
Visual properties of neurons in inferotemporal cortex of the Macaque.
Receptive fields, binocular interaction and functional architecture in the cat's visual cortex
Analysis of a Four-Layer Series-Coupled Perceptron. II
